author: craigmcc
msg: Synchronize put() calls that modify classCache to avoid
ConcurrentModificationException errors in the modified() method.

author: remm
msg: - The new aliases list for a host wasn't correctly set after calling addAlias.
Patch submitted by Deacon Marcus <deacon_marcus at wwtech.pl>

author: craigmcc
msg: It is legal for getCookies() to return null.

author: remm
msg: - Untested fix for a bug when stopping and restarting a context later with
the access controller of the JNDI ENC. The read only flag must be unset
Bug reported by Ulf Jaehrig <ulf.jaehrig at desys.com>

msg: The WebApp module distribution has been moved in jakarta-tomcat-connectors.
